languages.text: "Не помнишь, что сделал твой жалкий род с величественным миром-кораблем, несущим миллионы жизней Детей Азуриана сквозь звездные туманности и холод вселенной? Как мон-кай отобрали его у нас? Выжгли вены ядом и осквернили кровь?" {n}Кристальные слезы скатываются по щеке эльдара, срывая печать скорби с его спокойного лица.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не помнишь, что сделал твой жалкий род с величественным миром-кораблем, несущим миллионы жизней детей Азуриан сквозь звездные туманности и холод вселенной? Как мон-кей отобрали его у нас? Выжгли вены ядом и осквернили кровь?" {n}Кристальные слезы скатываются по щеке эльдара, срывая печать скорби с его спокойного лица.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не помнишь, что сделал твой жалкий род с величественным миром-кораблем, несущим миллионы жизней Детей Азуриана сквозь звездные туманности и холод вселенной? Как мон-кай отобрали его у нас? Выжгли вены ядом и осквернили кровь?" {n}Кристальные слезы скатываются по щеке эльдара, срывая печать скорби с его спокойного лица.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how mon-keigh took it away from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek as the seal of calm grief on his face is broken.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how mon-keigh took it away from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek as the seal of calm grief on his face is broken.{/n}

Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «¿No recuerdas lo que tu miserable dinastía le hizo a un majestuoso mundo astronave que transportaba millones de vidas Asuryani a través del frío cósmico tachonado de estrellas y decorado con nebulosas? ¿No recuerdas cómo nos lo arrebataron los mon-keigh? ¿Cómo quemaron nuestras venas y corrompieron nuestra sangre con su ponzoña?». {n}Unas lágrimas cristalinas surcan las mejillas del Aeldari, rompiendo la máscara de serenidad de su rostro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿No recuerdas lo que tu miserable dinastía le hizo a un majestuoso mundo astronave que transportaba millones de vidas Asuryani a través del frío cósmico tachonado de estrellas y decorado con nebulosas? ¿No recuerdas cómo nos lo arrebataron los mon-keigh? ¿Cómo quemaron nuestras venas y corrompieron nuestra sangre con su ponzoña?». {n}Unas lágrimas cristalinas surcan las mejillas del Aeldari, rompiendo la máscara de serenidad de su rostro.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「ちりばめられた星と星雲が覆う宇宙の寒さの中、何百万ものアシュリヤーニの命を運んでいた壮大な方舟に、お前たちの惨めな王朝が何をしたか覚えていないのか？モン＝ケイがどのように舟を奪ったか記憶にないというのか？我らの血管を毒で焼き、血を汚したことも？」{n}アエルダリの頬を伝った水晶の涙が、穏やかな顔に刻まれていた悲しみの封印を砕いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ちりばめられた星と星雲が覆う宇宙の寒さの中、何百万ものアシュリヤーニの命を運んでいた壮大な方舟に、お前たちの惨めな王朝が何をしたか覚えていないのか？モン＝ケイがどのように舟を奪ったか記憶にないというのか？我らの血管を毒で焼き、血を汚したことも？」{n}アエルダリの頬を伝った水晶の涙が、穏やかな顔に刻まれていた悲しみの封印を砕いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “难道你不记得，你那该死的王朝对我们宏伟的方舟世界做了什么吗？那座方舟世界载着数百万方舟灵族，穿越布满群星的冰冷宇宙，跨过其中的无数星云。猴子是怎么从我们手中夺走了它，用毒液灼伤我们的血管，腐蚀我们的血脉。这一切，难道你不知道，不在乎吗？”{n}晶莹的泪水顺着艾达灵族的脸颊流下，他脸上平静的表情此刻哀恸不已。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “难道你不记得，你那该死的王朝对我们宏伟的方舟世界做了什么吗？那座方舟世界载着数百万方舟灵族，穿越布满群星的冰冷宇宙，跨过其中的无数星云。猴子是怎么从我们手中夺走了它，用毒液灼伤我们的血管，腐蚀我们的血脉。这一切，难道你不知道，不在乎吗？”{n}晶莹的泪水顺着艾达灵族的脸颊流下，他脸上平静的表情此刻哀恸不已。{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Ne vous souvenez-vous pas de ce que votre misérable dynastie a fait au majestueux vaisseau-monde qui transportait des millions d'Asuryanis à travers l'hiver cosmique parsemé d'étoiles et drapé de nébuleuses ? Avez-vous déjà oublié ce que les mon-keigh nous ont pris ? Ne vous rappelez-vous pas la manière dont ils ont brûlé nos veines de leur venin et corrompu notre sang ? » {n}Des larmes cristallines coulent sur les joues de l'Aeldari, trahissant la douleur que cachait jusqu'alors son air serein.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous souvenez-vous pas de ce que votre misérable dynastie a fait au majestueux vaisseau-monde qui transportait des millions d'Asuryanis à travers l'hiver cosmique parsemé d'étoiles et drapé de nébuleuses ? Avez-vous déjà oublié ce que les mon-keigh nous ont pris ? Ne vous rappelez-vous pas la manière dont ils ont brûlé nos veines de leur venin et corrompu notre sang ? » {n}Des larmes cristallines coulent sur les joues de l'Aeldari, trahissant la douleur que cachait jusqu'alors son air serein.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr denn nicht mehr, was Eure jämmerliche Dynastie unserem majestätischen Weltenschiff angetan hat? Es war das Zuhause für Millionen von Asuryani auf ihrer Reise durch durch die kosmische Kälte, übersät mit Sternen und eingehüllt von Nebeln. Wisst Ihr denn nicht, dass Chem-Pan-Sey es uns weggenommen haben? Wie sie Gift in unsere Adern gebracht und unser Blut verderbt haben?" {n}Kristallene Tränen laufen dem Aeldari die Wange runter und brechen das Siegel der Trauer in seinem ernsten Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr denn nicht mehr, was Eure jämmerliche Dynastie unserem majestätischen Weltenschiff angetan hat? Es war das Zuhause für Millionen von Asuryani auf ihrer Reise durch durch die kosmische Kälte, übersät mit Sternen und eingehüllt von Nebeln. Wisst Ihr denn nicht, dass Chem-Pan-Sey es uns weggenommen haben? Wie sie Gift in unsere Adern gebracht und unser Blut verderbt haben?" {n}Kristallene Tränen laufen dem Aeldari die Wange runter und brechen das Siegel der Trauer in seinem ernsten Gesicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Yıldızlarla süslü, nebulalarla kaplı kozmik soğuğun zorluklarına göğüs geren milyonlarca Asuryani'nin yaşadığı o ihtişamlı gemidünyaya sefil hanedanlığının yaptıklarını hatırlamıyor musun? Mon-keighlerin onu bizden çaldıklarını, damarlarımızı zehirle yakıp kanımızı nasıl yozlaştırdıklarını hatırlamıyor musun?" {n}Aeldari'nin yanaklarından kristal gözyaşları dökülüyor, huzurla kaplı yüzündeki saklı kederi gün yüzüne çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you not remember what your miserable dynasty did to a majestic craftworld that carried millions of Asuryani lives through the cosmic cold studded with stars and draped with nebulae? Do you not remember how the mon-keigh took it from us? How they burned our veins with venom and corrupted our blood?" {n}Crystal tears run down the Aeldari's cheek, shattering the seal of grief on his serene face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yıldızlarla süslenmiş ve nebulalarla kaplanmış kozmik soğukluğun zorluklarına göğüs geren milyonlarca Asuryani'nin yaşadığı o ihtişamlı gemidünyaya sefil hanedanlığının yaptıklarını hatırlamıyor musun? Mon-keighlerin bizden onu çaldıklarını, damarlarımızı zehirle nasıl yakıp kanımızı nasıl yozlaştırdıklarını hatırlamıyor musun?" {n}Aeldari'nin yanaklarından kristal gözyaşları dökülerek huzurla kaplı yüzünde saklı kederi gün yüzüne çıkarıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
